duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain applications with a focus on Java 8, Spring, Spring Cloud, Hibernate, and Spring Boot.
Implement and integrate Big Data solutions, including microservices, REST services, and SOAP development.
Design and develop web and backend applications utilizing Domain Driven Design concepts and microservices architecture.
Incorporate secure development best practices and principles, including encryption, authentication, and authorization.
Work with Java build tools and dependency management, along with database experience in various systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams and adhere to Agile methodologies, with a focus on continuous integration build tools and cloud platforms.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
